title: Clinical Practical Skill Enhancement: Critical Thinking in Science Through Digital Role-Playing Games

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform evidence-based critical judgments with over 80% accuracy in scientific problem situations
Learners can conduct collaborative discussions on scientific dilemmas presented in digital role-playing games at least three times
Learners can demonstrate learning motivation levels improved by over 20% compared to pre-assessment after game-based learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
